idare.metanode.internal.Data.itemizedData

Class AbstractItemDataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • idare.metanode.internal.Interfaces.DataSet
      • idare.metanode.internal.Data.itemizedData.AbstractItemDataSet

  • public class AbstractItemDataSet
extends DataSet
    An Abstract basis class for item based datasets. The specific layout can be individually adjusted.
    Author:
    Thomas Pfau
